alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Franklin (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 7:39AM EST until March 07 at 7:47PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Olentangy River near Worthington. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Olentangy River near Worthington. * WHEN...From this morning to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Floodwater surrounds homes along Edgecliff Drive, as well as Plum Tree Drive in Worthington, cutting off residents. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 8.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this morning to 11.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
